title: I Transformed Into A Demon God And Became A World-Destroying Beast!
alternative_title: Wo Huashen Moshen, Cheng Wei Mie Shi Ju Shou! ; I Transformed into a Demon God and Became a World-Destroying Beast! ; Wǒ Huàshēn Móshén, Chéng Wéi Miè Shì Jù Shòu! ; 我化身魔神，成为灭世巨兽！
status: Wo Huashen Moshen, Cheng Wei Mie Shi Ju Shou! ; I Transformed into a Demon God and Became a World-Destroying Beast! ; Wǒ Huàshēn Móshén, Chéng Wéi Miè Shì Jù Shòu! ; 我化身魔神，成为灭世巨兽！
description:
Description :
        The prosperous city and peaceful society were suddenly destroyed by the outbreak of doomsday. Countless polluted monsters flooded the world, and the forbidden area descended. Billions of people died and the sea of ​​blood surged as the doomsday worlds were connected. At this time, Chen Chu, who had grown silently and was comparable to a god or demon, stood up. And behind him, there was a black monster that was 10,000 meters tall, shaped like Godzilla, but even more ferocious and huge.
